description:
Send your projects while keeping your hands clean. This version of Secret Stuff has a higher than usual concentration of ethanol that is required in many gyms now days.

  • Made with 80% Ethyl alcohol base
  • Great for gyms, and way less messy than loose chalk
  • Keeps your hands dry without having to re-chalk when working long problems
name: Friction Labs Secret Stuff Hygienic Liquid Chalk
